message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $110. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  How about we meet in the middle at $105?
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to go up to $102. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
